title: Bug 102623 - Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
description: When importing a new image into the layout, the image does not refresh and the original image is still displayed.
OB: After importing the new image, the original image remains visible instead of the new image.
EB: After importing the new image, the new image should be displayed instead of the original image.
SR:
1. Import a new image, 'image1.jpg', into the layout. 
2. Verify that the new image is displayed instead of the original image.
